name: Fall (itch) (MyFarms Game Jam II)
description:
This game was a submission to the MyFarms Game Jam II - Feb 2014

Entry by Tim Channell

Game:

Fall

Description:

A game in which you fall. A lot.

Controls:

Use mouse to move the player

Theme:

I had intended on you having to pick up hidden items as you fell in order to build / kick-start an escape device. But, time happened, so uh… “hidden” because you can’t see what’s coming up ahead while you’re falling.
